answers.answer: During the first 3-4 months is generally a repeat...urine treat, weight check, blood pressure check, measure of your uterus,  fetal heart beat and how you are doing. When you get further along, you'll have to take tests like diabetes snd get blood drawn as well as cervical test, but that's further down the road. Hope that helps...
Usually just weigh u an ask u how u feel an sometimes they draw blood... an if ur far enough along u get to hear the heartbeat an measure your stomach

question: I am a first time mommy and I am 9 weeks. I already went to my first doctors appt. There was A LOT of information giving. I don't remember some of the information. For those of you that have already gone to the doctor throughout your pregnancy, what is their to expect every 4 weeks? What does the doctor do? I do know that every doctors office is a little different but I didn't know if I could get a few answers so I don't go in caught off guard. Thanks =)
title: What to expect at rhe doctor?
